description:
Mistral AI has announced NeMo, a 12B model created in partnership with NVIDIA. This new model boasts an impressive context window of up to 128,000 tokens and claims state-of-the-art performance in reasoning, world knowledge, and coding accuracy for its size category. The collaboration between Mistral AI and NVIDIA has resulted in a model that not... Read more »

The post Mistral AI and NVIDIA unveil 12B NeMo model appeared first on AI News.
title: Mistral AI and NVIDIA unveil 12B NeMo model

description:
Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) has raised its revenue forecast for 2024, citing strong demand for chips in AI applications. The world’s largest contract chipmaker anticipates growth slightly above the mid-20% range in US dollar terms, up from its previous estimate. This adjustment comes as TSMC reports better-than-expected profits for the second quarter of 2024.... Read more »

The post TSMC forecasts record growth, rejects US joint venture amid AI surge appeared first on AI News.
title: TSMC forecasts record growth, rejects US joint venture amid AI surge

description:
A Reuters survey released recently laid bare a nuanced picture of Japanese corporate acceptance and social attitudes toward technology. The survey, conducted by Nikkei Research, anonymously polled 506 companies from 3-12 July, with around half responding. It provides a broad view of how corporate Japan is striking a balance between incorporating AI and tightening cybersecurity... Read more »

The post Over 40% of Japanese firms lack AI adoption plans appeared first on AI News.
title: Over 40% of Japanese firms lack AI adoption plans
